capsules_submitted.utterance: I was just talking to Harry the other day and I remember him wearing glasses. He's definitely got a pair on right now.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact I can confirm with confidence.
capsules_submitted.reply: i like it! so hermione and harry are both eleven years old.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old, huh? I think that's a pretty typical age for kids around here. (sentiment: neutral)
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is the name of a character who has an age of 11?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been noticing that Ron has a gray mouse as one of his belongings. I'm quite certain about it, and I'd say it's a pretty reliable piece of information. It seems to me that having a pet mouse can be a bit unusual for someone like Ron, but I suppose you never really know what people are capable of until you see them in action.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of talent does ron have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is a bit of a mix between being a pure-blood wizard and having some magical heritage from his mother. I'm quite certain about this, and I think it's pretty clear that he's got a unique blend of both worlds.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is affiliated with Hogwarts, that's confirmed. I've always found it interesting how the staff at Hogwarts are so dedicated to their roles and responsibilities. It's no surprise that Professor Flitwick is a key figure in the wizarding world of magic education.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of professor flitwick before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   what's he like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is an adult, huh? I'm pretty sure that's the case.

You know, I've always been fascinated by the life of Albus Dumbledore's predecessor, Flitwick. He was an adult when he became the Charms master at Hogwarts, and that's really interesting to me because it shows how much he had grown and matured as a wizard. I think it's great that he was able to take on such a significant role in the school despite his relatively young age at the time.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've heard that Flitwick is an adult, which makes sense given his role as a professor at Hogwarts. I'm not surprised he's considered an adult, to be honest.
